name: ArcView Layer File
summary: Learn about .LYR files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: LYR files are similar to Legend (.AVL) files, but may contain much more information and are saved in a binary format rather than as a text file.

description: Contains information available in ArcView's layer properties dialog box; may include symbols, display settings, joined table details, definition queries, labeling properties, and annotation display properties.
